name: Rumble from Beyond
description:
Rumble From Beyond is a narrative-driven space exploration sound game created for #GAMERella2019. The game was created over the course of 2 days in Construct 3. 

*  You are the captain of a space team responding to a series of enigmatic audio signals picked up by your ship.
*  You enter a mysterious alien construct from which you believe the signals are coming.
*  Explore your surroundings alone, or interact with a crew member to bring them along.
*  The results of your exploration may differ when you combine your perspectives
*  Write your report when you are ready to conclude the expedition.

A bit about our thought process...
Our team came together wanting to make a game that was primarily narrative-driven, experiential, and involved some cool sounds that interpreted the jam's theme, "rumble", sonically. As a team, we discussed a desire to explore the feelings that come with being an outsider in a space that wasn't intended for you. Integral to that is the experience of miscommunication and the feelings of alienation that arise when faced with it. Keep these things in mind exploring this (literally and figuratively) alien space! 

Created by Ida, Sai, and Thierry
